first_translate: I would like to invite you to my tea party this afternoon...

hangle: 온실에서 있을 티 파티에 영애를 초대하고 싶습니다.』
first_translate: ...at our greenhouse.”
“Please join us if you have time available today,
lady heather aden.”
isn’t she...

hangle: 어제 시그렌이랑 일이 있었던 그 영애 아냐?
first_translate: ...the lady that had some trouble with sir siegren yesterday?

hangle: 그런 사람이 여는 티파티에 내가 가도 되는 건가?
first_translate: do I really need to go to her tea party?

hangle: 내가 괜히 신경 쓸 만한 이유는 없지.
first_translate: but there’s no reason for me to worry about what happened last night.
she was at fault anyway.

hangle: 어쩌면 티파티에서 유니스를 만날 수 있을지도 모르니까.
first_translate: maybe I’ll get to see eunice again at the tea party.
tell her I’m happy to accept the invitation.
good morning, lady eunice.
it's lady fiona...!
were you invited as well, lady eunice?
yes, I was.

hangle: 피오나 영애와는 같은 일행임에도 계속 얼굴을 볼 수가 없었네요.
first_translate: even though we’re traveling together, I haven’t been able to talk much with you yet.
that’s because I’ve been riding on horseback.
still, please come visit me inside the carriage sometimes.
it gets so boring when I'm alone--

hangle: 주변에 온통 기사랑 병사라서 쓸쓸했나 봐.
first_translate: she must feel lonely since all those guards are around her.
this way, ladies.
the greenhouse is over here.
your hostess will meet you inside.
my goodness,
ladies fiona and eunice...
ladies fiona and eunice...
thank you both for coming.
I've been waiting for you two.
wow! she truly is beautiful.
no wonder she tried hitting on siegren.
now, please take a seat.
okay, thank you.
and these are the young ladies from nearby territories.

hangle: 명성이 자자한 두 분을 만나서 영광이에요.
first_translate: it’s such an honor to finally meet you two.
oh...
nice meeting you too.
huh?

hangle: 묘하게 시선이 불온한 것 같은 느낌이….
first_translate: for some reason, they seem hostile toward me...
didn’t you say you were living up north, lady heather?
correct.
wasn’t it difficult?

hangle: 거기에는 굉장히 야만적이고 잔혹한 마법사가 산다고 들었는데….
first_translate: I heard there lives a very barbaric and cruel magician up there...
all places where people live aren’t that different.
wait, did everyone hear about that rumor already?!
since rumors came up,
from what I know,
apparently, your bloodline isn’t quite normal.
I also heard that house haylon wasn’t originally your family name.
as far as I know,
you’re illegitimate.
yes, that’s correct.
I am indeed illegitimate.
so you knew everything about me.
why do you look so pleased?
on top of that, your original household...

hangle: 네. 마약 사업 혐의로 재산을 몰수당했죠.
first_translate: right. their assets were confiscated due to drug trafficking charges.
in fact, I reported them myself.
my gosh, I could never do something like that.

hangle: 무슨 이유에서든 가족을 자기 손으로 배신하는 건…
first_translate: to betray one’s own family regardless of any reason...
only beasts can do things like that.
j-just hold on!
lady fiona...
what exactly...
...are you trying to tell me?
I want you to stop crossing the line!
even if you got lucky enough to become someone else’s adopted daughter,
a noblewoman needs to maintain certain standards.
therefore,
you shouldn’t...
fiona.

hangle: 피오나 영애 왜 딴 곳을 보시죠.
first_translate: why are you looking somewhere else, lady fiona?

hangle: 지금 제가 말하고 있는 게 안 보이나요?
first_translate: can’t you see I’m talking right now?
I still have more to say.
while being hosted by another person’s manor,

hangle: 남의 저택에서 신세를 지고 있는 와중에 전하께 꼬리를 치셨죠?
first_translate: you hit on his highness, didn’t you?
my maid told me about how you acted last nigh--
excuse me.
lady aden, watch your mouth!
how dare you ask me to watch my mouth?
I’m only stating facts--
aaah!!!
aaaack!!
everything you said is true.

hangle: 전 사생아고, 제가 태어난 가문도 직접 부수었죠.
first_translate: I’m illegitimate, and I destroyed the household into which I was born.

hangle: 하지만 똑똑한 아덴 영애가 하나 파악하지 못한 게 있네요.
first_translate: but there’s one thing you failed to realize despite being smart, lady aden.
thanks to that, I possess power and authority.
I have both.

hangle: 지금 이 자리에서 제가 영애의 머리카락을 불태워도
first_translate: if I burn off every strand of hair on your head right now,

hangle: 아덴 자작님은 제 아버지께 항의서 몇 장 보내는 게 고작일 거란 뜻이죠.
first_translate: count aden won’t even bother sending a complaint letter to my father.

hangle: 망아지처럼 구는 것도 상대를 보면서 하세요.
first_translate: know your place before acting recklessly.
or else you might lose your neck someday.
and...
p-prince...
prince bernhart...
looks like you’re having fun at the tea party,
lady heather aden.
th-that’s...

hangle: 어제 그런 일이 있었으니 고개를 못 들겠지.
first_translate: of course you wouldn’t be able to face him after what happened last night.
let me give you one final piece of advice.
stop coveting other women’s men.
because he belongs to me now.
